content: knit this beautifully textured cardigan using bulky yarn and the lovely dot stitch the dotty cardigan is a chunky cardigan that looks so stylish with its sophisticated length ribbed collar and cozy pockets this cardigan works up very quickly and will look beautiful layered over jeans leggings dresses and all your outfits sizing is listed below check out the blog post for exact yardage and number of skeins required - bust 48 56 64 72 to fit actual bust of 32-38 40-46 48-54 56-62 - length 30 30 5 31 31 5 - armhole 7 8 9 10 the step-by-step blog post can be found ** here 1 ** join the **knit-along** through our facebook group ** here 2 ** note that the **worsted weight version** of this cardigan can be found ***here*** 3 the **light dotty cardigan** uses color theory yarn level 4 if you like this chunky cardigan design be sure to check out my beginner-friendly **downtown cardigan** that uses the simple garter stitch and the same bulky yarn **here** 4 1 https //www allaboutami com/the-dotty-cardigan/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/925500921183480/ 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/light-dotty-cardigan 4 https //www allaboutami com/the-downtown-cardigan/
